name: Circuitus
description: Circuitus is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red exterior, named rossoCorsa, it stands out among its robotic peers. Its box-like structure represents stability and precision, while the soldier arms and legs showcase its strength and agility. The screen, in the form of a snake, symbolizes Circuitus' ability to analyze and interpret data with remarkable accuracy. This unique combination of traits makes Circuitus an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club.
